channel.title: Bluur Webclient Connection Problem
channel.description: Hey guys I need some help on making a webclient for bluur. I already have the auto cache downloader working but it kept on saying connection error when I ran the webclient. So I made a few adjustments to client.java on the client side and it should be working but I keep on getting 1 error... [img]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g474/mnazari1/TFRFB1Ftmp.jpg[/img] If anyone can help me that would be great.

item.title: Bluur Webclient Connection Problem
item.dc:creator: @knightlord knightlord
item.description:
@knightlord wrote:

Can you teach me how? Because I already tried that and I get even more errors after that.
